snippet.title: Steve McQueen artworks acquired by Amsterdam museum
snippet.description:
Entertainment & Arts / 5 March 2014
A museum in Amsterdam has acquired two artworks by Steve McQueen, the Turner Prize-winning artist turned film-maker. The two pieces - a lightbox…

snippet.title: Van Gogh's Sunflowers are reunited after 65 years
snippet.description:
24 January 2014
Two of Vincent van Gogh's iconic sunflower paintings are shown together in London for the first time in 65 years.
